      • setDecimationFactor

        public DecimationFactorPacket setDecimationFactor(short decimationFactor)
        Sets decimation factor for ADXL stream.
        Parameters:
        decimationFactor - decimation factor for stream.
        Returns:
        DecimationFactorPacket 
         +-------------------------+-------------------------+
 | Decimation Lower Limit  |  Decimation Upper Limit |
 +-------------------------+-------------------------+
 |          0x01           |          0x05           |
 +-------------------------+-------------------------+

      • loadConfiguration

        public ADXLConfigPacket loadConfiguration(ADXLDevice deviceID)
        Loads specified device id configuration.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        ADXLConfigPacket

      • readDeviceConfigurationBlock

        public ADXLDCBPacket readDeviceConfigurationBlock()
        Returns entire device configuration block.
        Returns:
        ADXLDCBPacket

      • writeDeviceConfigurationBlock

        public ADXLDCBPacket writeDeviceConfigurationBlock(long[][] addressesValues)
        Writes the device configuration block values of specified addresses. This function takes a list of addresses and values to write, and returns a response packet as dictionary containing addresses and values.
        Parameters:
        addressesValues - array of addresses and values to write.
        Returns:
        ADXLDCBPacket 
         +----------------------+----------------------+
 | Address Lower Limit  |  Address Upper Limit |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
 |       0x20           |      0x2e            |
 +----------------------+----------------------+

      • writeDeviceConfigurationBlockFromFile

        public ADXLDCBPacket writeDeviceConfigurationBlockFromFile(java.io.File file)
                                                    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the device configuration block values of specified addresses from file.
        Parameters:
        file - dcb file.
        Returns:
        ADXLDCBPacket 
         +----------------------+----------------------+
 | Address Lower Limit  |  Address Upper Limit |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
 |       0x20           |      0x2e            |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • readRegister

        public ADXLRegisterReadPacket readRegister(int[] addresses)
        Reads the register values of specified addresses. This function takes a list of addresses to read, and returns a response packet as dictionary containing addresses and values.
        Parameters:
        addresses - array of register addresses to read.
        Returns:
        ADXLRegisterReadPacket 
         +----------------------+----------------------+
 | Address Lower Limit  |  Address Upper Limit |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
 |       0x00           |      0x2e            |
 +----------------------+----------------------+

      • writeRegister

        public ADXLRegisterWritePacket writeRegister(int[][] addressesValues)
        Writes the register values of specified addresses. This function takes a list of addresses and values to write, and returns a response packet as dictionary containing addresses and values.
        Parameters:
        addressesValues - array of register addresses and values to write.
        Returns:
        ADXLRegisterWritePacket 
         +----------------------+----------------------+
 | Address Lower Limit  |  Address Upper Limit |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
 |       0x20           |      0x2e            |
 +----------------------+----------------------+
